message.content: {"id": "18163", "title": "Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace", "description": "Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace", "OB": "When I select text with leading or trailing whitespace and then use Ctrl+M (Add Import), nothing happens because the trailing whitespace within the selection is not ignored.", "EB": "After selecting text with leading or trailing whitespace, using Ctrl+M (Add Import) should ignore the trailing whitespace within the selection and perform the import action.", "SR": "The Add Import feature should be modified to disregard any leading or trailing whitespace in the selected text, allowing the import action to be performed successfully."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
